src:
張立東撩妹慘遭連環打槍　曾智希被取笑走心爆哭
07 Nov 2019, 12:09 by 蔡世偉
17 Media馬拉松式直播綜藝節目《明星製作人》，由阿Ken和納豆各自帶隊攜手主持，兩隊每週製作節目透過直播觀眾滿意度比拚，本週再次邀請到上次代班主持的《通靈少女》學姊謝翔雅和盧彥澤擔任來賓，進行了激烈的水果運動大戰。
謝翔雅前一天在家被菜刀切傷手縫了4針，張立東在邀約她上節目時曾表示會準備好各種水果和鱸魚湯慰問她，一到現場還不忘趁機想施展招牌撩妹招式但話都還沒說到重點，就被謝翔雅打斷他吐槽說：「好囉，聽過了！」張立東不死心轉頭撩主持群中的21歲直播主思璇Soda「我吃魚只吃魚頭，你知道為什麼嗎？」沒想到思璇對他搖手說「不要給我你的餘生喔！」張立東無奈喊「她怎麼也聽過了啊？」
車程中納豆關切曾智希怎麼壓力大到嘴角冒痘痘，曾智希對上週謝翔雅代班的篡位危機仍有陰影說「我很難過，昨天就哭了一整晚，我不想面對這一切，你們變心了！」納豆安慰「變得只有張立東，我是愛你的，如果今天謝翔雅跟你掉到水裡，我一定先救你，真的啊，然後我陪謝翔雅一起淹水」笑翻眾人。


《明星製作人》再次邀請到上次代班主持的《通靈少女》學姊謝翔雅(右一)上節目，讓曾智希(左三)相當擔心自己主持地位不保。（明星製作人提供）

張立東念念不忘上週與謝翔雅的互動還頻頻取笑曾智希，不少網友留言挺曾智希，納豆稱讚曾智希真的很不錯，長得又漂亮，曾智希突然神色有異跟納豆說「你不要稱讚我，我會想哭」說著轉頭靠向椅背開始噴淚哭哭，在直播中哭了近20分鐘，讓直播觀眾看到都傻眼，紛紛留言安慰曾智希，張立東緊張安慰，還和納豆開始合唱《說好不哭》，張立東把智希名字融入歌詞，納豆立刻拿掉帽子眼鏡做樣子抱吉他認真模仿起阿信，兩人歌聲終於讓爆哭的曾智希破涕為笑。
更新時間｜2019.11.07 12:07
text:
Zhang Lidong’s sister was brutally shot, and Zeng Zhixi was teased and cried.
07 Nov 2019, 12:09 by Cai Shiwei
17 Media Marathon live variety show "Star Producer", led by Ak and Natto, each team, the two teams produce weekly programs through the live audience satisfaction competition, this week again invited the last generation of the hosted "Psychic "Girls" Xue Xie Xiangya and Lu Yanze served as guests and engaged in a fierce fruit sports battle.
Xie Xiangya was cut by a kitchen knife at home the day before, and Zhang Lidong said that she would prepare a variety of fruits and squid soup to express her condolences when she invited her to the show. When she arrived at the scene, she did not forget to take the opportunity to display the signature sisters. Without talking about the key points, Xie Xiangya interrupted him and said: "Well, I heard it!" Zhang Lidong turned his head and turned to the 21-year-old live host of the group. "I eat fish and eat fish head, you Do you know why?” I didn’t think that he would shake his hand and say, “Don’t give me the rest of your life!” Zhang Lidong shouted, “How did she hear it?”
During the drive, Natto was concerned about how Zeng Zhixi was so stressed that he had acne on his mouth. Zeng Zhixi still had a shadow on the crisis of Xie Xiangya’s class last week. “I’m very sad. I cried all night, I don’t want to face it all, you guys. Change your heart!" Natto comfort "Become Zhang Lidong, I love you. If Xie Xiangya falls to the water with you today, I must save you first, really, then I will flood with Xie Xiangya."


"Star Producer" once again invited to the "Psychic Girl" hosted by the last generation of the class, Xie Xiangya (right one), so that Zeng Zhixi (third from left) was quite worried about his presidency. (provided by the star producer)

Zhang Lidong never forgets that the interaction with Xie Xiangya last week also made fun of Zeng Zhixi. Many netizens commented that Zeng Zhixi, Natto praised Zeng Zhixi as really good, and looks beautiful. Zeng Zhixi suddenly looked different and said to Natto, "You don't praise me, I will think "Crying" said to turn to the back of the chair and began to shed tears and cried, crying for nearly 20 minutes in the live broadcast, let the live audience see dumbfounded, have a message to comfort Zeng Zhixi, Zhang Lidong nervous comfort, and began to sing with Natto, "Say good or not Cry, Zhang Lidong puts the name of Zhixi into the lyrics. Natto immediately took off his hat glasses and looked at the guitar and seriously imitated Axin. The songs of the two people finally made the crying Zeng Zhixi break into laughter.
Update time|2019.11.07 12:07
